avalancheActivity.comment: The avalanche danger is assessed as low. There are only isolated danger spots at high altitudes. Spontaneous, small wet snow avalanches cannot be ruled out from extremely steep, shaded slopes and gullies that have not yet been unloaded.

snowpackStructure.comment: On slopes on the sunny side at high altitudes the snow has fully retreated. Only on the shady side there is a closed snow cover, although even there it is already wet or moist. The snow depths quickly decrease.

tendency.highlights: Continued weak high-pressure influence with sunshine and mild temperatures. The retreatment is progressing.

weatherForecast.comment: Monday will be mostly sunny, although some spring clouds will appear in the afternoon. The probability of local thundery showers remains low. In the north, temperatures will reach +8 degrees at 2000 m with a brisk southerly wind, in the south +5 degrees with a weak to moderate southerly wind.

customData.generalHeadline: High pressure influence - snow depths decrease quickly.
